attributes.action: stop the closure of Ash Grove Primary School and Nursery, Macclesfield.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Situated within a vulnerable community, this well kept and improving school is a vital establishment to the area, along with the very recent addition of the Children’s Centre. With dedicated, supportive staff, and the stability of a secure and devoted Head Teacher, the loss of this school will have a devastating effect on the future education of our children and would be felt in the community far and wide. Our multi-faith/multi-racial school, proudly and successfully, embraces all faiths of it’s pupils, without discrimination. Many generations of families have attended this school with parents and grandparents now seeing their own children/grandchildren become part of this warm and well-loved school. Please help us save our school...
